title: [NS0] Is Looking for Serious Sup|Mid|Jungle|+Sub (Gold I+)
body:
{{champion:36}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:69}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:55}}   ~| **Noxian Special Ops**|~{{champion:7}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:27}} {{champion:14}} {{champion:50}} 

New ranked team looking for members for: Mid, Jung, and Support (as well as subs). Gold 1+
(will consider your rank from last season if provisional were harsh on you, we've all been there.)

About the captain
I'm 21, I've been playing league of legends since beta, and have played in various ranked teams throughout the seasons. I'm currently platinum 5. I'm extremely relax, and probably the easiest person to get along with. It's been a very long time since I've played in a serious ranked team, and entered some 5v5 tournaments and I long for that again. I'm a Computer Science Major, with a not so busy schedule. :)

What I expect from my team
1. Overall this is a game, so I expect everyone to have fun,
2. I have 0 tolerance for raging! You make a mistake we analyze it, we learn from it, we move on.
3. That everyone on said team is on at scheduled practice time, I understand life comes first but give your team a heads up so we can find a temp/sub to hold out. You're responsible for our time at that point, please don't waste it Q_Q.
4. Bad manners, I've played in enough teams to see that one guy just bm the opposing team (spamming taunt or flaming in all chat at them), congrats you placed them on tilt, and made them feel worse that they are having an off game. (karma is around the corner), Also actions like that are removable from tournaments that behavior will not be tolerated.
5. Team improvement off and on the field. You all are going to be friends! noxian's in arms!! I'd like to see my teammates playing together whether it's duo's, normals, 1v1 practicing champions, aram...etc. (shoot I might even drag you all into a game of hide and seek) :P

What I have to offer
1. Coaching I have several friends, ranging from challenger to gold willing to duo and provide coaching lessons on their off time.
2. After game analyst, I'll have recordings and statistics of each of our games and will be able to provide 1 on 1 feedback.
3. Almost 24/7 online time so if you need a duo partner, help with something, or complaint about a teammate.
4. I'm a gifting addict, and since I win a lot of tournaments I have RP up the wazoo so expect myst gifts often lol (this is not a reason to join the team!!!)
5. I have plenty of experience playing in teams, and knows what it takes to be a team captain, and shot caller if I must.

Roster: 
Marksman: DaPika
Support: Available
Mid: Available
Top: Rizhao
Jungle: Available
Sub1: Rasdori
Sub2: Lugh
Sub3: Available

Practice Schedule
We will practice 3-4 times a week entering tournaments at least twice a month.

Tuesday 9pm central
Thursday 9pm Central
Friday Undecided: Tournament times vary
Saturday Undecided: Tournament times vary
Sunday Undecided: Tournament times vary

Are you able to handle constructive criticism?: its what i live for. I just want to get better
Tell me about yourself?: Senior Chemical Engineering major I enjoy playing lol, and I have always loved playing games competitively. 
What do you think you have to offer the team?: i try to always keep things light, I love to play the game and and always open to whatever. Im easy going and will play whatever the team needs. Need some laughs? i got you. Need some pimps? i got you. Need someone to pull up their briches and be the big boy? nuff nuff Jigglypuff. 
How Noxian are you?: I cant be Noxian because i drink more than they do.
